red.name: Afraid
red.desc: experiencing fear or threat

red.name: Agitated
red.desc: very troubled and restless

red.name: Alarmed
red.desc: a sense of urgent fear or concern

red.name: Ambivalent
red.desc: having contradictory attitudes or feelings about something

red.name: Angry
red.desc: strongly bothered about a perceieved injustice

red.name: Anguished
red.desc: experiencing severe physiological pain or suffering

red.name: Annoyed
red.desc: bothered by something displeasing or uncomfortable

red.name: Anxious
red.desc: worried and uneasy about an uncertain outcome

red.name: Apprehensive
red.desc: unease and worry about something that might happen

red.name: Astonished
red.desc: greatly surprised or impressed

red.name: Concerned
red.desc: wondering if someone or something is okay

red.name: Confused
red.desc: feeling unable to make sense of something

red.name: Contempt
red.desc: feeling a combination of anger and disgust

red.name: Dazed
red.desc: feeling you are unable to think or react

red.name: Discombobulated
red.desc: thrown into a state of confusion or uncertainty

red.name: Discomfort
red.desc: feeling of unease or pain

red.name: Displeased
red.desc: feeling unhappy, dissatisfied, or disapproving

red.name: Distracted
red.desc: feeling diverted or far away from the present focus

red.name: Distressed
red.desc: feeling unwell and agitated physiologically, can have different causes (emotional pain, threat, loss, etc.)

red.name: Dread
red.desc: anxiety because of expecting something unpleasant or upsetting

red.name: Dumbfounded
red.desc: being speechless with shock

red.name: Dysregulated
red.desc: feeling you can't steady your emotions

red.name: Embarrassed
red.desc: self-conscious and uncomfortable about how you think others are perceiving you

red.name: Enraged
red.desc: made furious by something; filled with extreme anger

red.name: Envious
red.desc: feelings of desire for something that someone else has

red.name: Exasperated
red.desc: experiencing intense irritation

red.name: Flabbergasted
red.desc: feeling intense surprise or shock

red.name: Fomo
red.desc: fear of missing out

red.name: Foolish
red.desc: feeling self-conscious after doing something unwise

red.name: Frazzled
red.desc: feeling exhausted, disorganised, and emotionally frayed

red.name: Frightened
red.desc: afraid or fearful

red.name: Frozen
red.desc: feeling you cannot act due to overwhelming anxiety or fear

red.name: Frustrated
red.desc: upset because you cannot do something you want to do

red.name: Furious
red.desc: full of extreme or wild anger

red.name: Grumpy
red.desc: feeling bad-tempered and easily annoyed

red.name: Hate
red.desc: intense dislike for something or someone

red.name: Horrified
red.desc: experiencing intense fear or disgust

red.name: Hyper
red.desc: feeling energetic and like you want to make around

red.name: Impassioned
red.desc: filled with lots of emotion

red.name: Indecisive
red.desc: feeling unable to make a decision due to conflicting emotions

red.name: Indignant
red.desc: feeling angry and disgusted when unfairly treated

red.name: Irate
red.desc: feeling like your anger is almost out of control

red.name: Irked
red.desc: feeling leery and impatient

red.name: Irritable
red.desc: feeling easily bothered or angered

red.name: Irritated
red.desc: slightly angry with or annoyed by an action or event

red.name: Jealous
red.desc: threatened that you're losing an important relationship to someone else

red.name: Jittery
red.desc: feeling on edge and jumpy

red.name: Livid
red.desc: feeling furious about something or someone

red.name: Mad
red.desc: feeling intensely angry

red.name: Nauseated
red.desc: feeling sick with disgust

red.name: Nervous
red.desc: jumpy and worried about the future or an uncertain event

red.name: Obsessed
red.desc: preoccupied or haunted by an idea or interest

red.name: Overwhelmed
red.desc: feeling like you have been taken over by strong feelings

red.name: Panicked
red.desc: feeling frantic and overcome by fear

red.name: Passionate
red.desc: feeling intense engagement and commitment to someone or something

red.name: Peeved
red.desc: slightly irritated about something

red.name: Pissed
red.desc: very angry or annoyed

red.name: Pressured
red.desc: feeling as if an important outcome depends on you

red.name: Repulsed
red.desc: nauseated by someone or something

red.name: Restless
red.desc: unable to relax due to anxiety or boredom

red.name: Rushed
red.desc: feeling pressured to move or do something quickly

red.name: Scared
red.desc: perceiving threat or danger, whether physical or physiological

red.name: Scorn
red.desc: feeling that someone or something is worthless or despicable

red.name: Shocked
red.desc: experiencing extreme horror, disgust, and surprise

red.name: Spiteful
red.desc: a desire to infuriate someone to get back at them

red.name: Startled
red.desc: move or jump suddenly with surprise or alarm

red.name: Strained
red.desc: tension from engaging in extreme effort

red.name: Stressed
red.desc: strained mentally or emotionally from too many demands and not enough resources

red.name: Stunned
red.desc: feeling confused or astounded by an event

red.name: Taken Aback
red.desc: being surprised by something unpleasant or offensive

red.name: Tense
red.desc: unable to relax

red.name: Terrified
red.desc: consumed by fear

red.name: Triggered
red.desc: feeling set off or activated by something

red.name: Troubled
red.desc: feeling worried about a problem or conflict

red.name: Uncertain
red.desc: lack of clarity or confidence about something

red.name: Uneasy
red.desc: vague sense that something is wrong

red.name: Unstable
red.desc: feeling unbalanced and unsteady

red.name: Upset
red.desc: feeling disturbed or agitated

red.name: Vengeful
red.desc: a desire to harm someone because of a preceieved injustice

red.name: Worried
red.desc: troubled about actual or potential problems
